features: [ENHANCED CLEANING ABILITY]- Compared to other ordinary mop heads on t he market, our ocedar mop refill add 40% more cleaning area. They are made of 100% high quality microfiber, which is extremely absorbent and won't scratch the floor surface.
[REMOVES MORE THAN 99% OF DUST]- The newly upgraded mop replace head removes more than 99% of dust with fresh water. No need to add extra bleach or detergent.
[DURABLE]- Set includes 3 new upgraded replacement mop heads. NOTE: Spin mop heads are only suitable for O Cedar Easy Wring Spin Mop 1-Tank System.
[MACHINE WASHABLE] O cedar mop head can be simply washed and dried in the washing machine to renew the microfiber and reusable, which can help you save your time doing housework.
[MULTI USE] Mop replacement head easily removes and absorbs stubborn dirt and dust from all floor surfaces without streaking on hardwood, laminate, tile, vinyl, linoleum and more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mop on Steroids
reviews.reviewText: I love this "heavy-duty" version for cleaning up gross messes. However, the older versions were easier to pull off. I did see that people pull them off with their feet on YouTube. I just like mine to last as long as they can so I try to keep my "Mom Boss" equipment in top shape. I recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the mop heads that come with iy
reviews.reviewText: These should come with the mop. I prefer these over the original mop heads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like these more than the basic mopheads that my original ocedar mop set came with. They switch out easily and clean very well. I like not needing to worry about missing spots and have an easier time scrubbing particularly grimy spots with this new mop head. I've only washed them once so far but they seem to be holding up pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, as nice as the original
reviews.reviewText: Even with the OCedar spin mop, I deplore cleaning the floors. Even after rinsing and spinning furiously, the mop head is still dirty and too wet. Because it’s so dense and thick, it takes days to dry, and that’s after I use my hands to squeeze out as much water as I can–defeats the purpose of a hands-free cleaning tool.Enter this 3 pack from Dwavele. These came vacuum sealed very tightly, but expand when opened to be as fluffy as the original. I tried one so far and it fits securely and cleans about the same, no complaints. Having four mop heads now allows me to dirty them all before I do an exclusive laundry load with just floor mops and pads. I’ve always found these to be way too filthy to wash with other things, yet I could never use the machine to wash just one mop head– too wasteful. Now I have enough and can mop to my heart’s content. Glad I found this replacement pack. Just make sure these are the right fit for your model before ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These replacement mops are definitely better than the ones I had before

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mop heads
reviews.reviewText: While all of these are technically reusable, The strands on these mop heads seem like they'd really grab ahold of stuff and not let it go, including when you try to clean them out. Usually I don't wash a mop head for a while, so it'll be a couple of moppings before I switch these out. So far they work just as good as the original heads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Replacement Option
reviews.reviewText: I love my spin mop but don't love having to buy replacement mop head. They're expensive and sometimes difficult to find in my area. These are easy to clean and work just as well as the others. Keep in mind that the red on the mop is not textured like the other ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the right spin mop replacement head.
reviews.reviewText: For the longest I was purchasing the wrong mop heads. I was getting the two tank system mop head instead of the spin mop replacement head. If you have a two-tank system, this is not the mop head for you they are very different. The two tank mop heads are smaller and doesn't fit the spin mop system. When you first attach the mop head to mop and dip into water, the mop head will become heavy and fall of the mop pole. All of the replacements do this, so be careful when pulling the mop out of the bucket, go slow and try not to let the mop head come off. When you start drying the mop you will not have this problem anymore. Happy I found the right mop head.
